messages.content:
You will be given questions about fictional characters from the "Spouses" saga.

Answer the following question.
Tell me who the following people are married to: Ty, Arrow, Both, Johnny, Floor, Crear, Fraction, Helper, Numbers, Philip. Then tell me where those spouses were born.

Ty shares a marital bond with Other. Arrow shares a marital bond with Flow. Both shares a marital bond with Form. Johnny shares a marital bond with Plant. Floor shares a marital bond with Safe. Crear shares a marital bond with Ground. Fraction shares a marital bond with Lie. Helper shares a marital bond with Peace. Numbers shares a marital bond with Spell. Philip shares a marital bond with Ka.

Other first saw the light of day in Ionic. Flow first saw the light of day in Backdrop. Form first saw the light of day in Fitness. Plant first saw the light of day in Baby. Safe first saw the light of day in Mary. Ground first saw the light of day in Pause. Lie first saw the light of day in Concept. Peace first saw the light of day in Nit. Spell first saw the light of day in Bitmap. Ka first saw the light of day in Nous.
